subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Possibly a compound of {{com|ojp|sort=むらさき|群|tr1=mura|t1=[[gathering]], [[group]]|咲き|tr2=saki<sub>1</sub>|t2=[[blooming#Noun|blooming]]|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ojp|咲く|tr=saku}}, “‎to [[bloom#Verb|bloom]]”}}. {{rfv-etymology|ojp|sort=むらさき}}
